00028 #include <stdlib.h>
00029 
00030 #include "dbprim.h"
00031 #include "dbprim_int.h"
00032 
00033 RCSTAG("@(#)$Id: ht__free_8c-source.html,v 1.3 2006/09/04 15:12:17 spale Exp $");
00034 
00035 unsigned long
00036 ht_free(hash_table_t *table)
00037 {
00038   initialize_dbpr_error_table(); /* initialize error table */
00039 
00040   if (!ht_verify(table)) /* verify argument */
00041     return DB_ERR_BADARGS;
00042 
00043   if (table->ht_flags & HASH_FLAG_FREEZE) /* don't free from frozen tables */
00044     return DB_ERR_FROZEN;
00045 
00046   if (table->ht_count) /* make sure the table's empty */
00047     return DB_ERR_NOTEMPTY;
00048 
00049   if (!table->ht_modulus && !table->ht_table) /* short-circuit */
00050     return 0;
00051 
00052   free(table->ht_table); /* free allocated memory */
00053 
00054   table->ht_modulus = 0; /* zero the table and modulus */
00055   table->ht_rollover = 0; /* must also zero the rollover/rollunder */
00056   table->ht_rollunder = 0;
00057   table->ht_table = 0;
00058 
00059   return 0;
00060 }
